contents.name: nominalVoltage
contents.comment: The power system resource's base voltage.  Shall be a positive value and not zero.

contents.name: ConductingEquipment
contents.comment: All conducting equipment with this base voltage.  Use only when there is no voltage level container used and only one base voltage applies.  For example, not used for transformers.

contents.name: TransformerEnds
contents.comment: Transformer ends at the base voltage.  This is essential for PU calculation.

description: Defines a system base voltage which is referenced.
comment: Adapted from CIM and https://github.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/ data models
